FOOTER.SOBRE-TEXTO: We are a networking platform with the goal of increasing the capacity of all artists and art lovers to create and establish a better bussiness relationship between themselves, creating, this way, more business contacts, more sales, more knowledge and more engagement.
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: 2021 All Rights Reserved by Team Padawans

INICIO.TITULO: The best place to connect yourself with art
INICIO.SUBTITULO: We are anetworking platform for artists and art lovers
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTITULO: Create, display and sell your art. Discover new works and talk to their creators. Search for products and services and purchase them through the platform itself. Art+ is your social network for sharing and trading content from various artistic fields. Come see!
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO1: Search by name or category for your favorite artists and find their designs and items for sale.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO2: Display your products and services on a personalized page where all members of the community can get in touch.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO3: Follow the works of great artists and interact with people from around the world.
INICIO.SOBRE-SUBTEXTO4: Connect with profiles that share your personal and professional interests
INICIO.PLANOS-SUBTITULO: The free plan already offers your profile to everyone, the Premium plan makes you go further. For a small monthly fee, it gives you customization options, greater platform awareness and access to a Dashboard function that lets you see your profile metrics at any time. Acquire all these advantages and gain benefits for your profile and your business.

RECOMENDACAO.SUBTITULO: These profiles were chosen according to the artistic fields of interest to you. Activities, user interactions and searches made will be used to customize future suggestions. Discover new artists and follow their projects through Art+.
RECOMENDACAO.TOOLTIP-RECOMENDACAO1: The Art+ platform will recommend artists that the Art+ platform understands are relevant to you!
RECOMENDACAO.TOOLTIP-INTERESSES1: The system will recommend artists from the categories you choose on the interests page.

CONSTRUCAO.TITULO: Sorry, the page is under construction

INTERESSES.SUBTITULO: Choose the categories of artists that you have more interest to follow

USUARIOS.TEXTO1: Here are all your search's results!
USUARIOS.TEXTO2: We´re sorry, but we haven´t found anything on your search. Please try other words!

ASSINANTES.TEXTO1: The Best of Art+ for You!
ASSINANTES.TEXTO4: Your profile at the top of searches and recommendations.
ASSINANTES.TEXTO5: Keep taking advantage of all available features by renewing your subscription!

USERCOMUM.SUBTITULO01-RECOMENDACAO: These profiles were chosen according to the artistic branches of your interest.

DASHBOARD.CARD-NULL-TEXT2: You still don't have enough data to create the chart.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP-DASH1: The Dashboard shows your engagement metrics within the platform, so you get comments, likes and visits to your profile!
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP-DASH2: The line in purple color is your data, while the dashed line in gray color is the forecast data that the Art+ platform calculated, based on a linear regression algorithm.
DASHBOARD.TOOLTIP-DASH3: It is noteworthy that in the first month of using the platform, the forecast line appears as a straight line, as we do not have enough data. However, in the coming months, we will get to know you better and your chart will look more like reality.
DASHBOARD.NO-PREMIUM-TEXT2: You do not have the premium plan to view your Dashboard yet.
DASHBOARD.NO-PREMIUM-TEXT3: Enjoy! Get the premium plan now!
DASHBOARD.NO-PREMIUM-TEXT4: Some of the metrics your Dashboard will have are:
DASHBOARD.NO-PREMIUM-TEXT5: Number of comments and likes in your portfolio
DASHBOARD.NO-PREMIUM-TEXT6: Forecast your metrics for the coming months
